TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PromptBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: 创建空的 对象，并为添加内容、选择语音、控件语音属性和控件朗读单词的发音提供方法。

span.span: Creates an empty object and provides methods for adding content, selecting voices, controlling voice attributes, and controlling the pronunciation of spoken words.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与，你可以添加内容类型添加到的提示符下，（作为字符串或文件），包括纯文本、 SSML 标记的各种记录音频，或甚至另一个对象。With , you can add a variety of content types to a prompt, including plain text, SSML markup (as a string or a file), recorded audio, or even another object. 要追加到文本对象，并根据需要控制语音属性，如强调、 速率和卷，则使用之一方法。To append text to a object and optionally control voice attributes such as emphasis, rate, and volume, use one of the methods. 此外可以为具有的组来控制语音属性和方法。You can also control voice attributes as a group with the and methods. 你可以将文本追加和控制什么都说或它的发音使用如何， ， ， ，或方法。You can append text and control what is spoken or how it is pronounced using the , , , , or methods. 更改当前所选讲话声音在提示符处使用的重载之一所需的方法，命名使用或指定特定语音语音特征，例如年龄和性别。Change the currently selected speaking voice in the prompt using one of the overloaded methods, naming a specific voice to use or specifying required voice characteristics, such as age and gender. 若要生成语音从对象，可以将其作为自变量传递方法。To generate speech from a object, you can pass it as an argument to the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[构造复杂提示](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/552cb356-7344-473e-b0f2-7a9983f8c1a4)。For more information, see [Constructing a Complex Prompt](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/552cb356-7344-473e-b0f2-7a9983f8c1a4).

summary.span: 创建 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 创建 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed

param.name: culture
param.span: 提供有关特定区域性的信息，如其语言、区域性的名称、写入系统、使用的日历以及如何设置日期和排序字符串。

span.span: Provides information about a specific culture, such as its language, the name of the culture, the writing system, the calendar used, and how to format dates and sort strings.

summary.span: 创建 类的新实例并指定区域性。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class and specifies a culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数设置的值属性。This constructor sets the value for the property. 对象将尝试选择支持指定的语言已安装的语音`culture`参数来处理提示。The object will attempt to select an installed voice that supports the language specified by the `culture` parameter to process the prompt. 如果找到与指定的区域性的声音，则将使用它。If a voice with the specified culture is found, it will be used. 如果找不到与指定的区域性的声音，则将使用默认语音。If a voice with the specified culture cannot be found, the default voice will be used. 若要正确发音中所指定的语言`culture`必须安装参数，语音合成 （文本到语音转换或 TTS） 引擎支持的语言。To correctly pronounce words in the language specified by the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) engine that supports the language must be installed. 已安装的 TTS 引擎称为语音。An installed TTS engine is called a voice. 若要获取有关特定区域性的哪些安装语音的信息，请使用方法。To get information about which voices are installed for a specific culture, use the method. Microsoft Windows 和 System.Speech API 作为的值接受所有有效的语言-国家/地区代码`culture`。Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes as values for `culture`. 随 Windows 7 的 TTS 引擎支持以下语言-国家/地区代码：The TTS engines that shipped with Windows 7 support the following language-country codes: - EN-US。en-US. 英语 （美国）English (United States) - 中文-CN。zh-CN. 中文 （中国）Chinese (China) - 中文-TW。zh-TW. 中文 （台湾）Chinese (Taiwan) 此外允许两个字母的语言代码，例如"en"。Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted. ## Examples 下面的示例中创建实例，并指定其。The example that follows creates a instance and specifies its . ```csharp using System.Speech.Synthesis; public void MySimpleText () { PromptBuilder builder = new PromptBuilder(new System.Globalization.CultureInfo("en-US")); builder.AppendText("Hello world!"); } ``` 以下标记显示等效的 SSML:The following markup shows the equivalent SSML: ```xml Hello world! ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AppendSsmlMarkup(string ssmlMarkup) cil managed

param.name: ssmlMarkup
param.span: 一个包含 SSML 标记的字符串。

span.span: A string containing SSML markup.

summary.span: 将包含 SSML 标记的指定字符串追加到 对象。

span.span: Appends the specified string containing SSML markup to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在追加 SSML 标记时，你必须使用适当的转义字符。You must use the appropriate escape characters when appending SSML markup. 请注意向后的斜杠前面封闭的值的引号`interpret-as`属性在下面的示例：Notice the backward-slashes preceding the quotation marks enclosing the value of the `interpret-as` attribute in the following example: ```csharp builder.AppendSsmlMarkup(" chair "); ``` > [!NOTE] > 使用作为的自变量的字符串不能包括`speak`元素。The string used as an argument to cannot include a `speak` element. 使用时来指定在内联发音`phoneme`元素，你可以使用从任何以下拼音字母表，提供当前语音引擎支持它的手机：When using to specify inline pronunciations in a `phoneme` element, you can use phones from any of the following phonetic alphabets, provided that the current speech engine supports it: - 国际音标 (IPA)International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA) - 设置通用电话 (UPS)Universal Phone Set (UPS) - 设置 SAPI 电话SAPI Phone Set 任何 SSML 符合语音引擎将从 IPA 通信手机。Any SSML-compliant speech engine will speak phones from the IPA. 你还可以将包含 SSML 标记使用之一的文件方法。You can also append a file containing SSML markup using one of the methods. 若要将追加要发言文本的不标记语言格式，请使用之一， ， ，或方法。To append text to be spoken that is not formatted with markup language, use one of the , , , or methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 中的语音合成引擎目前不支持强调参数。The speech synthesis engines in Windows do not support the emphasis parameter at this time. 设置强调参数的值将会产生任何声音更改合成的语音输出中。Setting values for the emphasis parameter will produce no audible change in the synthesized speech output.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AppendTextWithAlias (string textToSpeak, string substitute);
.method public hidebysig instance void AppendTextWithAlias(string textToSpeak, string substitute) cil managed
Public Sub AppendTextWithAlias (textToSpeak As String, substitute As String)
public: void AppendTextWithAlias(System::String ^ textToSpeak, System::String ^ substitute);

param.name: textToSpeak
param.span: 包含文本表示形式的字符串。

span.span: A string containing the text representation.

span.span: A string containing the text to be spoken.

summary.span: 将文本追加到 对象，并指定在该追加的文本位置处朗读的别名文本。

span.span: Appends text to the object and specifies the alias text to be spoken in place of the appended text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这允许文档包含读出和写入窗体提示。This allows a document to contain both a spoken and a written form for a prompt. 例如，写入的形式可能是首字母缩写词，例如 SAPI，并且的口头的形式可能的首字母缩写，在此案例语音应用程序编程接口的扩展的文本。For example, the written form could be an acronym, such as SAPI, and the spoken form could be the expanded text for the acronym, in this case Speech Application Programming Interface. ## Examples 下面的示例将文本字符串 （"语音合成标记语言"） 和其别名 ("SSML") 追加到对象。The following example appends a text string ("Speech Synthesis Markup Language") and its alias ("SSML") to a object. 合成将发音"S S M L"。The synthesizer will pronounce "S S M L". ``` PromptBuilder alias = new PromptBuilder(); alias.AppendTextWithAlias("Speech Synthesis Markup Language","SSML"); ```

summary.span: 将文本追加到 对象，并指定该文本的内容类型。

span.span: Appends text to the object and specifies the content type of the text.

span.span: Appends text to the object and a that specifies the content type of the text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此方法指定中未包括的内容类型枚举。You can use this method to specify a content type that is not included in the enumeration. 但是，TTS 引擎必须支持你指定的参数。However, the TTS engine must support the parameter that you specify.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AppendTextWithPronunciation (string textToSpeak, string pronunciation);
.method public hidebysig instance void AppendTextWithPronunciation(string textToSpeak, string pronunciation) cil managed
Public Sub AppendTextWithPronunciation (textToSpeak As String, pronunciation As String)

param.name: textToSpeak
param.span: 包含使用语言传统字母表写入形式的单词的字符串。

span.span: A string containing the written form of the word using the conventional alphabet for a language.

param.name: pronunciation
param.span: 包含要以国际音标 (IPA) 进行朗读的电话的字符串。

span.span: A string containing phones to be spoken from the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA).

summary.span: 将文本追加到 对象，并为该文本指定发音。

span.span: Appends text to the object and specifies the pronunciation for the text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 合成说出的内容`pronunciation`参数，不包括的内容`textToSpeak`参数。The synthesizer speaks the contents of the `pronunciation` parameter, not the contents of the `textToSpeak` parameter. 在提示中的内联指定的发音仅适用于 word 的单个匹配项，并重写语音引擎或任何其当前处于活动状态的词典的发音。Pronunciations specified inline in prompts apply only to the individual occurrence of a word and override pronunciations of the speech engine or any of its currently active lexicons. 通常情况下，你将使用内联发音为自定义现有单词的发音或不常见的字，例如专有名词，其中语音合成引擎可能的发音以及预期的发音。Typically, you will use inline pronunciations for custom pronunciations of existing words or for pronunciation of uncommon words, such as proper names, which the speech synthesis engine may not pronounce as well as expected. 必须使用手机从国际音标 (IPA) 指定内联发音。Inline pronunciations must be specified using phones from the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA). 手机就是语音的字母或表示离散声音的字符。A phone is a letter or character that represents a discreet sound of speech. 符合的语音引擎[语音合成标记语言 (SSML) 版本 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763)规范将发音 IPA 从手机。Speech engines that comply with the [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763) specification will pronounce phones from the IPA. 若要指定使用其他拼音字母表的内联发音，请参阅。To specify inline pronunciations using other phonetic alphabets, see . IPA 发布[图表](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=58362)，列出其电话，并将其映射到 Unicode 数字。The IPA publishes a [chart](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=58362) that lists its phones and maps them to Unicode numbers. IPA 字母表中的某些手机具有 Latin 字母表中字母作为相同的表示形式。Some phones in the IPA alphabet have the same representations as letters in the Latin alphabet. 在这些情况下，很可能键入拉丁字符集，并让手机上的正确表示形式。In those cases, it is possible to type the Latin character and have the proper representation for a phone. 因为文本中常使用的拉丁字符可能代表 IPA phone 集的多个手机，只需键入拉丁字符可能不生成所需的精确 IPA 手机。Because the Latin characters as commonly used in text may represent several phones of the IPA phone set, simply typing the Latin character might not result in the precise IPA phone desired. 其他手机 IPA 字母必须以代码形式表示的字符引用组成一个与号 (&)、 井号 （#），并为所需的电话以十六进制或十进制数字，Unicode 大量所有后跟分号 （;）。Other phones of the IPA alphabet need to be represented in code as character references consisting of an ampersand (&), the number sign (#), and a Unicode number for the desired phone in hexadecimal or decimal, all followed by a semicolon (;). 例如，schwa (&\#x0259;) 将由表示`ə`。For example, a schwa (&\#x0259;) would be represented by `ə`. 若要添加新的或自定义多个单词的发音，例如到快速区域方言还是添加专有名词或特定于教育或医疗专业的词汇，生成词典，并将其添加到使用。To add new or custom pronunciations for multiple words, for example to express regional dialects or to add proper names or vocabulary that is specific to an educational or medical discipline, build a lexicon and add it to the using . ## Examples 下面的示例初始化的新实例类。The following example initializes a new instance of the class. 它然后追加的文本字符串"我的名称是"到的实例。It then appends the text string "My name is" to the instance. 最后，它将包含正确的名称"DuBois"一个字符串追加，并指定名称的发音。Finally, it appends a string containing the proper name "DuBois" and specifies the pronunciation of the name. ```csharp public void ProperName() { PromptBuilder builder = new PromptBuilder(); builder.AppendText("My name is"); // Add a proper name and its pronunciation. builder.AppendTextWithPronunciation("DuBois", "duˈbwɑ"); } ``` 以下标记显示 SSML 此对象生成。The following markup shows the SSML that this object generates. ```xml My name is DuBois ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ClearContent() cil managed

summary.span: 清除 对象中的内容。

span.span: Clears the content from the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ Culture { System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ get(); void set(System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ value); };
member this.Culture : System.Globalization.CultureInfo with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的区域性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets the culture information for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象将尝试选择支持指定的语言已安装的语音属性来处理提示。The object will attempt to select an installed voice that supports the language specified by the property to process the prompt. 如果找到与指定的区域性的声音，则将使用它。If a voice with the specified culture is found, it will be used. 如果找不到与指定的区域性的声音，则将使用默认语音。If a voice with the specified culture cannot be found, the default voice will be used. 区域性还可以指定在提示中的内容使用的离散部分， ，和方法。A culture may also be specified within the prompt for discreet sections of content using the , , and methods. 指定的大部分内容使用上述方法之一将重写的区域性属性时在起作用，和将尝试选择支持指定的语言已安装的语音`culture`方法参数。A culture specified for a portion of content using one of the above methods will override the property while in effect, and the will attempt to select an installed voice that supports the language specified by the `culture` parameter of the method. 若要正确发音中所指定的语言必须安装属性，语音合成 （文本到语音转换或 TTS） 引擎支持的语言。To correctly pronounce words in the language specified by the property, a speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) engine that supports the language must be installed. 已安装的 TTS 引擎称为语音。An installed TTS engine is called a voice. 若要获取有关特定区域性的哪些安装语音的信息，请使用方法。To get information about which voices are installed for a specific culture, use the method. Microsoft Windows 和 System.Speech API 作为的值接受所有有效的语言-国家/地区代码`culture`。Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes as values for `culture`. 随 Windows 7 的 TTS 引擎支持以下语言-国家/地区代码：The TTS engines that shipped with Windows 7 support the following language-country codes: - EN-US。en-US. 英语 （美国）English (United States) - 中文-CN。zh-CN. 中文 （中国）Chinese (China) - 中文-TW。zh-TW. 中文 （台湾）Chinese (Taiwan) 此外允许两个字母的语言代码，例如"en"。Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted. 请参阅[语言标识符常量和字符串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd318693\(VS.85\).aspx)有关语言代码的完整列表。See [Language Identifier Constants and Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd318693\(VS.85\).aspx) for a comprehensive list of language codes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EndParagraph() cil managed

summary.span: 指定 对象中的段落结束。

span.span: Specifies the end of a paragraph in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它们分割为句子和段落长提示后，可以将其呈现为更像人工语音。Long prompts can be rendered more like human speech if they are broken into sentences and paragraphs. 有关示例，请参见 。See for an example.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EndSentence() cil managed

summary.span: 指定 对象中的句子结束。

span.span: Specifies the end of a sentence in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它们分割为句子和段落长提示后，可以将其呈现为更像人工语音。Long prompts can be rendered more like human speech if they are broken into sentences and paragraphs. 有关示例，请参见 。See for an example.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EndStyle() cil managed

summary.span: 指定 对象中的样式结束。

span.span: Specifies the end of a style in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法停止当前语速样式。The method stops the current speaking style. 说话样式会恢复为生效之前已设置方法启动一个新的语速样式。The speaking style reverts to the setting that was in effect before the method initiated a new speaking style. 有关示例，请参见 。See for an example.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EndVoice() cil managed

summary.span: 指定 对象中的语音使用结束。

span.span: Specifies the end of use of a voice in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法停止当前语音用于语音输出。The method stops the use of the current voice for speech output. 语音会恢复为生效之前已设置方法启动一个新的声音。The voice reverts to the setting that was in effect before the method initiated a new voice.

summary.span: 指定 对象中指定区域性中的段落开始。

span.span: Specifies the start of a paragraph in the specified culture in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它们分割为句子和段落长提示后，可以将其呈现为更像人工语音。Long prompts can be rendered more like human speech if they are broken into sentences and paragraphs. `culture` ，段落的参数可以为不同于属性包含它的对象。The `culture` parameter for a paragraph can be different than the property of the object that contains it. 实际上，而值`culture`参数将覆盖属性。While in effect, the value of the `culture` parameter will override the property. 将尝试选择支持指定的语言已安装的语音`culture`参数进行沟通段落。The will attempt to select an installed voice that supports the language specified by the `culture` parameter to speak the paragraph. 如果找到与指定的区域性的声音，则将使用它。If a voice with the specified culture is found, it will be used. 如果找不到与指定的区域性的声音，则将使用默认语音。If a voice with the specified culture cannot be found, the default voice will be used. 若要停止使用指定的语音，调用。To stop using the voice specified by , call . 若要正确发音中所指定的语言`culture`必须安装参数，语音合成 （文本到语音转换或 TTS） 引擎支持的语言。To correctly pronounce words in the language specified by the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) engine that supports the language must be installed. 已安装的 TTS 引擎称为语音。An installed TTS engine is called a voice. 若要获取有关特定区域性的哪些安装语音的信息，请使用方法。To get information about which voices are installed for a specific culture, use the method. Microsoft Windows 和 System.Speech API 作为的值接受所有有效的语言-国家/地区代码`culture`。Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes as values for `culture`. 随 Windows 7 的 TTS 引擎支持以下语言-国家/地区代码：The TTS engines that shipped with Windows 7 support the following language-country codes: - EN-US。en-US. 英语 （美国）English (United States) - 中文-CN。zh-CN. 中文 （中国）Chinese (China) - 中文-TW。zh-TW. 中文 （台湾）Chinese (Taiwan) 此外允许两个字母的语言代码，例如"en"。Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它们分割为句子和段落长提示后，可以将其呈现为更像人工语音。Long prompts can be rendered more like human speech if they are broken into sentences and paragraphs. `culture`句子的参数可以为不同于`culture`参数包含句子的段落或属性包含它们的对象。The `culture` parameter for a sentence can be different than the `culture` parameter for the paragraph that contains the sentence or the property of the object that contains them. 实际上，而值`culture`参数将覆盖属性和`culture`参数包含句子的段落。While in effect, the value of the `culture` parameter will override the property and the `culture` parameter for the paragraph that contains the sentence. 将尝试选择支持指定的语言已安装的语音`culture`参数进行沟通句子。The will attempt to select an installed voice that supports the language specified by the `culture` parameter to speak the sentence. 如果找到与指定的区域性的声音，则将使用它。If a voice with the specified culture is found, it will be used. 如果找不到与指定的区域性的声音，则将使用默认语音。If a voice with the specified culture cannot be found, the default voice will be used. 若要停止使用指定的语音，调用。To stop using the voice specified by , call . 若要正确发音中所指定的语言`culture`必须安装参数，语音合成 （文本到语音转换或 TTS） 引擎支持的语言。To correctly pronounce words in the language specified by the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) engine that supports the language must be installed. 已安装的 TTS 引擎称为语音。An installed TTS engine is called a voice. 若要获取有关特定区域性的哪些安装语音的信息，请使用方法。To get information about which voices are installed for a specific culture, use the method. Microsoft Windows 和 System.Speech API 作为的值接受所有有效的语言-国家/地区代码`culture`。Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes as values for `culture`. 随 Windows 7 的 TTS 引擎支持以下语言-国家/地区代码：The TTS engines that shipped with Windows 7 support the following language-country codes: - EN-US。en-US. 英语 （美国）English (United States) - 中文-CN。zh-CN. 中文 （中国）Chinese (China) - 中文-TW。zh-TW. 中文 （台湾）Chinese (Taiwan) 此外允许两个字母的语言代码，例如"en"。Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void StartStyle(class System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle style) cil managed

param.name: style
param.span: 要开始的样式。

span.span: The style to start.

summary.span: 指定 对象中的样式开始。

span.span: Specifies the start of a style in the object.

summary.span: 指示合成器更改 对象中的语音。

span.span: Instructs the synthesizer to change the voice in a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一种声音表示已安装的 TTS 引擎。A voice represents an installed TTS engine. 使用方法和类来获取的名称和属性的安装可以选择的文本到语音转换 (TTS) 语音。Use the methods and class to obtain the names and attributes of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select. 在应用程序调用，该方法验证是否在注册表中查找的语音的每个符合特定最小的条件。When an application calls , the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria. 对于未通过验证，任何声音设置其属性`False`。For any voice that fails verification, sets its property to `False`. 应用程序不能调用任何方法语音其属性是`False`。An application cannot call any of the methods on a voice whose property is `False`. 通常情况下，应用程序不会设置某个声音属性。Typically, applications will not set a voice’s property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `culture`参数可以不同于属性包含它的对象。The `culture` parameter for can be different than the property of the object that contains it. 实际上，而值`culture`参数将覆盖属性。While in effect, the value of the `culture` parameter will override the property. 将尝试选择支持指定的语言已安装的语音`culture`参数进行沟通括在内容和。The will attempt to select an installed voice that supports the language specified by the `culture` parameter to speak the content enclosed by and . 如果找到与指定的区域性的声音，则将使用它。If a voice with the specified culture is found, it will be used. 如果找不到与指定的区域性的声音，则将使用默认语音。If a voice with the specified culture cannot be found, the default voice will be used. 若要停止使用指定的语音，调用。To stop using the voice specified by , call . 若要正确发音中所指定的语言`culture`必须安装参数，语音合成 （文本到语音转换或 TTS） 引擎支持的语言。To correctly pronounce words in the language specified by the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) engine that supports the language must be installed. 已安装的 TTS 引擎称为语音。An installed TTS engine is called a voice. 若要获取有关特定区域性的哪些安装语音的信息，请使用方法。To get information about which voices are installed for a specific culture, use the method. Microsoft Windows 和 System.Speech API 作为的值接受所有有效的语言-国家/地区代码`culture`。Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes as values for `culture`. 随 Windows 7 的 TTS 引擎支持以下语言-国家/地区代码：The TTS engines that shipped with Windows 7 support the following language-country codes: - EN-US。en-US. 英语 （美国）English (United States) - 中文-CN。zh-CN. 中文 （中国）Chinese (China) - 中文-TW。zh-TW. 中文 （台湾）Chinese (Taiwan) 此外允许两个字母的语言代码，例如"en"。Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.

Public Sub StartVoice (gender As VoiceGender, age As VoiceAge, voiceAlternate As Integer)
public: void StartVoice(System::Speech::Synthesis::VoiceGender gender, System::Speech::Synthesis::VoiceAge age, int voiceAlternate);
member this.StartVoice : System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceGender * System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceAge * int -> unit

param.name: gender
param.span: 要使用的语音的性别。

span.span: The gender of the voice to use.

param.name: age
param.span: 要使用的语音的年龄。

span.span: The age of the voice to use.

param.name: voiceAlternate
param.span: 整数，当多个语音与 gender 和 age 参数匹配时，指定首选语音。

span.span: An integer that specifies a preferred voice when more than one voice matches the gender and age parameters.

summary.span: 指示合成器更改 对象中的语音并指定其性别、年龄以及与指定的性别和年龄匹配的首选语音。

span.span: Instructs the synthesizer to change the voice in the object and specifies its gender, age, and a preferred voice that matches the specified gender and age.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 语音合成引擎计算的匹配它发现指定的参数，并返回所选声音，当计数等于时`voiceAlternate`参数。A speech synthesis engine counts the matches it finds for the specified parameters, and returns the voice when the count equals the `voiceAlternate` parameter. 使用方法和类来获取的名称和属性的安装可以选择的文本到语音转换 (TTS) 语音。Use the methods and class to obtain the names and attributes of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select. 若要停止使用指定的语音调用。To stop using the voice specified by call .
